author: franzoni
body:
copy of #10414
including one commit from https://github.com/davidlange6/cmssw/tree/FixUnschAgain3
thanks @davidlange6 , 
moving tests from my local (wf 4.77 is ok locally on top of CMSSW_7_4_7_patch2) to the bot.

Description:

++ data and full sim (noPU, PU, premix) => Unsch RECO together mini aod

. fastSim not migrated to unscheduled, no miniaod for cosmics
. double url for DQM gui upload

++ the GRAN-parent of #10138 has been used for 3 full sets of relvals submissions

https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/3823.html (FileReadErrors)
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/3830.html (dqmAk4PFL1FastL2L3ResidualCorrector)
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/relval/3832.html (RSS)

which completed with errors not ascribable to unscheduled.
title: Unsch RECO w/ miniaod relvals + David's fix - retry4
